name: instance_id
comment: The instance architecture. Valid values: i386 | x86_64

name: public_dns_name
comment: The public DNS name of the instance.

name: image_id
comment: The ID of the image used to launch the instance.

name: instance_lifecycle
comment: Indicates whether this is a Spot Instance. Valid values: spot

name: instance_state_code
comment: The state of the instance. The high byte is an opaque internal value and should be ignored. The low byte is set based on the state represented. Valid values: 0 (pending) | 16 (running) | 32 (shutting-down) | 48 (terminated) | 64 (stopping) | 80 (stopped)

name: instance_state_name
comment: The state of the instance.Valid values: pending | running | shutting-down | terminated | stopping | stopped

name: instance_type
comment: The type of instance (for example, m1.small).

name: ip_address
comment: The public IP address of the instance.

name: kernel_id
comment: The kernel ID.

name: key_name
comment: The name of the key pair used when the instance was launched.

name: launch_time
comment: The time when the instance was launched (for example, 2010-08-07T11:54:42.000Z).

name: monitoring_state
comment: Indicates whether monitoring is enabled for the instance. Valid values: disabled | enabled

name: owner_id
comment: The AWS account ID of the instance owner.

name: placement_group_name
comment: The name of the placement group for the instance.

name: platform
comment: The platform. Use windows if you have Windows based instances; otherwise, leave blank. Valid value: windows

name: private_dns_name
comment: The private DNS name of the instance.

name: private_ip_address
comment: The private IP address of the instance.

name: ramdisk_id
comment: The RAM disk ID.

name: reason
comment: The reason for the current state of the instance (for example, shows "User Initiated [date]" when you stop or terminate the instance). Similar to the state-reason-code filter.

name: root_device_name
comment: The name of the root device for the instance (for example, /dev/sda1).

name: root_device_type
comment: The type of root device that the instance uses.Valid values: ebs | instance-store

name: state_reason_code
comment: The reason code for the state change.

name: stat_reason_message
comment: A message that describes the state change.

name: subnet_id
comment: The ID of the subnet for the instance.

name: tenancy
comment: The tenancy of an instance.Valid values: dedicated | default

name: virtualization_type
comment: The virtualization type of the instance. Valid values: paravirtual | hvm

name: vpc_id
comment: The ID of the VPC that the instance is running in.

name: hypervisor
comment: The hypervisor type of the instance. Valid values: ovm | xen
